name: Burg_46
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dominant; Riveric pidgin common
diet heavy on smoked fish and seaweed stews
rituals tied to tides and seasonal fishing runs
constraints: no instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
long-range mind influence is rare and banned
notes: navigational auguries used but not a substitute for seamanship
state governance unknown; local guilds hold sway
